title: Track fault at Pasir Ris causing service disruption

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train services are now operating normally. Free bus service has ceased.
[EWL] UPDATE: Due to an earlier track fault, estimate additional 10 minutes travelling time between #Tampines and #PasirRis on both bound.
[EWL] UPDATE: Train service between #Tampines and #PasirRis has resumed. Trains will be travelling at slower speed due to an earlier fault.
[EWL] Due to a track fault at #PasirRis, there is no train service between #Tampines and #PasirRis on both bound for 20 minutes.
